title: Marine Cove Playground at East Coast Park Area C
blurb: Enjoy views of the sea at this 3,500sqm playground.
description: Marine Cove Playground offers a wide variety of play features, ranging from climbing nets and balance beams to swings and slides, providing options for children of all ages. Highlights include a lighthouse-inspired play tower with rope bridge, climbing nets and slides, toddler play areas with spinning wheels and a grass maze, and inclusive play equipment designed to encourage those of different abilities to play together. The playground features swings designed for spinning and sensory play panels that help in the development of motor skills. Suitable for kids of all ages.
full_address: East Coast Park Area C (1000 East Coast Parkway, Singapore 449876) Open 24 hours About Marine Cove Playground Enjoy views of the sea as your children run free at this 3,500sqm playground

title: Lighthouse-Inspired Play Tower at Marine Cove
blurb: An 8m tower with rope bridge, nets, and slides.
description: This lighthouse-inspired play tower at Marine Cove features a three-story structure with various engaging elements for children. It includes a rope bridge, climbing nets, and three slides set at different levels, providing a range of play experiences. One of the slides is wide enough to accommodate both parents and children, allowing them to slide down together. The playground is designed to encourage active play and exploration in a safe and stimulating environment, making it a great spot for families with kids of all ages to enjoy outdoor fun and physical activity. The tower's design and features cater to children's adventurous spirit, promoting physical development and imaginative play.
full_address: East Coast Park Area C (1000 East Coast Parkway, Singapore 449876)
